# Masyu (Double Back)

This is a [Masyu](https://puzz.link/rules.html?mashu) puzzle with the additional constraint that each region must be visited exactly twice.

Click the image to solve on Penpa+.
[![Click to solve on Penpa+](../../images/puzzles/2024/masyuDoubleBack1.png)](https://swaroopg92.github.io/penpa-edit/#m=solve&&)
